page.title: 20LAINDON FACILITIES
page.content: We interviewed people of different ages to find out their thoughts about Laindon. Most people enjoy the country parks, the open spaces and nature trails in {Langdon Hills.}Nearly everyone said that the main{shopping centre}was fairly good as it is possible to buy all the basic things that a family might need. However there were a complaints about the{litter}that always seems to mess up the centre and the long queues at the{Post Office. We when we asked about the{health {centre,}most people said that it was adequate but coould be improved with more staff and opening longer. There is no{police station in}Laindon and some people think our area should have these services. When they are needed the{police and fire service }have to be contacted at Basildon.
